issue.title: [CF 480] compat problem with DRData lib v2.7
issue.body:
I run with disembedded libs and a new version of DRData was just rolled out that generates errors with TellMeWhen.

That version of DRData has its own error which I opened a ticket against (http://www.wowace.com/addons/drdata-1-0/tickets/5-2-7-release-throws-an-error/).  However, when I made what looked like the obvious fix locally for that bug, TellMeWhen still generated a couple of errors.  Its not clear to me whether those are still DRData bugs or whether TellMeWhen is written in a way that it has to be manually updated each time there's a new category added to DRData.

The error messages I'm getting, with the tweaked version of DRData 2.7, are:

Message: TellMeWhen: TMW: The DR category "bindelemental" is undefined!
Debug:
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2582: Error()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2805: ProcessEquivalencies()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1367:
      TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1347
   (tail call): ?
   [C]: ?
   [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9:
      [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5
   (tail call): ?
   Ace3\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:514: InitializeAddon()
   Ace3\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:629:
      Ace3\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:621

followed by:

Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua line 2806:
   table index is nil
Debug:
   (tail call): ?
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2806: ProcessEquivalencies()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1367:
      TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1347
   (tail call): ?
   [C]: ?
   [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9:
      [string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5
   (tail call): ?
   Ace3\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:514: InitializeAddon()
   Ace3\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:629:
      Ace3\AceAddon-3.0\AceAddon-3.0.lua:621


> Posted by CurseForge user stencil | Imported from CurseForge issue #480 | Raw

comments.body:
Indeed, TMW does have to be updated if new categories are added. The syntax error in DRData has already been fixed.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fixed in r494. I opened a ticket for DRData to fix some incorrect spellIDs.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
